msg.msgText: A call to send() or publish() failed because the delivery mode is not valid. Valid delivery modes are DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT and DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.

msgExplanation.p: The delivery mode value in calls to send() or publish() must be DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT or DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.

msgUserResponse.p: Use only valid delivery mode values: DeliveryMode.NON_PERSISTENT and DeliveryMode.PERSISTENT.
